text: But taking off all the fat, as is want to be taken away of the victims of peace offerings, he shall burn it upon the altar for a sweet savor to the Lord, and he shall pray for him, and it shall be forgiven him.

segments.text: But taking off all the fat, as is want to be taken away of the victims of peace offerings,
he shall burn it upon the altar for a sweet savor to the Lord, and he shall pray for
him, and it shall be forgiven him.
